user_request: see creations saved in the google photos
screen_desc: This screenshot displays a section of a photo management app, likely Google Photos, where users can filter their media content. The options include categories such as "Videos," "Movies," "Animations," and "Collages." There is also a "Show more" option to explore additional categories or media types. The top bar includes a search bar for finding specific photos or videos and a microphone icon for voice search.
